title: Meetings Automation
description: Automated creation of Scrum meetings on Teams through scripting improving Scrum Masters efficiency.

title: Processes Management
description: A Solution to enhance storability, streamline summary generation, and track processes efficiently within a law firm.

title: Shooter Game Project
description: A 2D looter shooter game with player-versus-monster dynamics. Players wield three distinct weapons, battling through varied monster challenges to advance levels.

title: Bus System
description: Implemented an app to find the best bus route in Porto, optimizing temporal and spatial complexity using a graph structure from a specific city point.
